description:
Follow the St. Louis high school sports scene with  24/7 coverage from the Post-Dispatch and Suburban Journals. 

The two biggest news organizations in St. Louis team up with Sports Stats to bring you the most thorough and most authoritative coverage of St. Louis high school sports. 
Besides features like polls, athletes of the week and game previews, you'll get hundreds of stories each day as we cover all the high school sports in St. Louis. 

You can receive feeds from you favorite team or conference, or follow you favorite sport.  
  
  
1.  Individual news feeds from more than 150 schools in the St. Louis area
2.  Photo galleries
3. Share stories on Facebook and Twitter and download content for off-line reading
4. Daily scoreboards and schedule
5. Commentary and analysis from high school blogs
